website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive set that performs well and can drill through basic metals.
pros: Has a tip made from very strong titanium
Can also work on wood or other materials
cons: While these metalworking bits will work well on wood, they are not rated for masonry use

customer_reviews.title: High quality, do not try to eat.
customer_reviews.text: TL;DR: Great drill bits, strong material, nice box, all the right sizes. Do not attempt to eat these drill bits. That would be a very bad decision. Also, if you are attempting to do amateur lobotomies, please report yourself to the local authorities. You also do not need a drill bit of this quality. A cheaper drill bit will work just fine. These are extremely ineffective as chopsticks, too short and too sharp. When inserted into a small gauge shotgun shell (20+ gauge) and viewed with a very high speed video camera, they will in fact rotate in mid-air but fail to have any accuracy. Also, this is a terrible idea. Please don't do this.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Goldensohn

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but you don't get 21 different drill sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Good drill bits that seem to last for a while in hardwood oak. They have a small amount of flex, but not too bad. I haven't snapped any of them yet. So the problem is that with the case, I would expect this to be drill bits and 20 different sizes, but Dewalt gives you two of each of the following sizes 1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 7/64 and 1/8th inch bits. Its a bit misleading with the description and with the way the bits are all organized in different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These bits are terrible. I have already broken four of them with very mild use. Unbelievably poor quality. I was stupid to buy these, please don't make the same mistake!
customer_reviews.author: ElectricSteve

customer_reviews.title: Crap period I used these to put a hole in ...
customer_reviews.text: Crap period I used these to put a hole in a oak tree for a bolt and could not get any penetration so I tried my old black and decker bit and it went through like butter. waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: john johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I bought them and yet the first one I used broke. I'm not satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Burt

customer_reviews.title: Bits and Good, Box is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good drill bits but what I like best about this product is the way the bits go in and out of the slots in the box. I've had others where you have to press the bit into the hole and then struggle to pull it out next time. With this box you put the bit in at a bit of an angle and just press it so it's standing straight up. This system makes getting the bits in and out of the box very easy. Someone should have thought of this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Benozzo

customer_reviews.title: Junk, broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. People bash harbor freight but I have their cheapest bit set and it has lasted years. This junk bit set broke on a white pine 2x4, first use. Of course the set hasn't been touched for a year after I purchased and from what I read dewalt doesnt stand by there product. You can see in the picture it is brand new. Do yourself a favor, DONT BUY DEWALT. Youre buying Chinese junk, you might as well pay the right price to begin with.

customer_reviews.title: Very Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Two of my tips broke off the first time I used them. I am extremely disappointed in this product. I work in construction and tools are my livelihood. If they fail, that costs me time. And time equals money. Unfortunately, I don’t have the time to take this somewhere to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Smokes

customer_reviews.title: Break too easy! Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: So I've had two bits break now during first uses. These have no sort of usable warranty either since I didn't use them within 30 days of purchase... Like I get things can wear but I'm sorry. I have 20 year old bits that work better. These should not break so easy when properly used. Makes me think poor metal used or not properly hardened or something.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bits
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt makes good tools and this set is no exception. I recently worked on a DIY project where I needed to drill about 30 pilot holes into hard wood and used the thinnest bit. I worried that the bit would break because of the hardness of the wood and the number I had to drill. The wood was so hard, I had a thumb tac that bent when I tried to push it into the wood. The bit stayed strong and made it through the entire project perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality...
customer_reviews.text: I’m using to a home works and it’s don’t works fine. Not works on wall and not works on wood, not sharper .
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: It is 21 pieces but not what you would think..
customer_reviews.text: So the product does state 21 pieces but as shown in the box itself it says there are 2 pieces for each size up to a certain size then the more larger pieces have one of themselves. People explain and deduct stars by not reading entire packages and descriptions. I will deduct 1 star for the actual use. These bits are more suitable for wood for sure havent tried the metal as much because I did not wish to break the tips but as read before a few people have had trouble some havent. Know your material if youre looking at a harder material to drill in.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not for metal good for wood
customer_reviews.text: I had these before. When i looked up metal bits these came up. I had these before and accedently bought them. These are not good for metal. You can get 1-4 metal holes in like. A conduit and that is about it. It is good for wood. Or if you just need a base set to start with in a pinch. No to metal good for wood. Dont like that dewalt will not stand by their bits as one reviewer put it. Im too lazy to send items back at this price. But dont need to. I know what i got.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Necessary Set If You Want To Drill Holes
customer_reviews.text: This set of drill bits is a great set for anyone who is looking for a wide range of sizes. The set contains most of the sizes you'll ever need and it being built by DeWalt you expect decent quality. The box itself is great since the new design allows you to attach similar boxes together for easier keeping. Loving the new box design because of this. The bits seem sturdy and I have not had one break on me yet like the other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great bits, but use a punched point
customer_reviews.text: I got these as I work as a woodworker and needed a good set of drill bits (especially 1/2"). I got just that in the value of these and they continue to be as good and sharp as day 1. The only issue I have is that, while it's less than a bargain brand bit with no pilot point, I still find myself having to use a center punch to allow a recess for the point to sit in or else it will wander up to an 1/8 of an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Useless drill bits
customer_reviews.text: All the smaller drill bits have all broken after using them for 1-3 times on oak. They just shatter I'm the piece and I have to dig them out. Useless drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW1361 Titanium Pilot Point Drill Bit Set, 21-Piece
customer_reviews.text: Santa knew that my husband's drill bits had been disappearing at an alarming rate, so this year he received a set of standard and metric drill bits. DeWalt is a name associated with quality tools. The 21-piece Titanium Drill Bit set was the perfect addition to my husband's toolbox. He was very impressed with the quality of the bits as well as the nice case, which provides him with ease of storage. When one thinks DeWalt, they should always think Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ramey Paulsson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort?
customer_reviews.text: It does repel rain quite well but the application is a lot of work, a lot. Applying it is easy but buffing it down to a clear finish takes a long, long time, a lot of pressure and a a large supply of paper towels. After going through all that until the windshield was completely clear of any visible residue a rain came along to test it and the wipers stuttered and chirped as if they were being dragged along because of the coating. Probably works better than Rain-X in the long run but considering how quick and easy Rain-X is to apply I'll stick with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill Bit Set...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. My first "Dewalt" buy and I'm not disappointed. The drill bits comes in a grear plastic case for storage. Multiple sizes are offered which is a bonus. My Black & Decker drill bits broke tring to drill a tree stump recently and I needed a new set. Price offered is fair and a bargain. Since these a "Titanium Bits" I'm hopingbthey would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Bought this dewalt set just for one bit lol, (someone previously lost most of my old bits so I had to.) definitely a perfect fit for my craftsman drill. (Perfect for small home improvement DIYs ) ps these are sharp.. my thoughts tho. I will be using these a lot for my woodwork projects One of the pictures is from the biggest bit in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Soooo pumped on the bits!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new set of bits and found this large selection a 21 piece deal for around $20. I figure these were mass-produced crap. Boy was I happy to be wrong. I have TONS of tools and bits and everything, these are SUPER NICE bits that work VERY well. The case is excellent as well. Excellent customer service, fast shipping, the item is as described, and I am very happy with the product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Papa TTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt has always been quality...
customer_reviews.text: I follow a guy on YouTube who does unbiased quality control on multiple company drill bits under same conditions. He looks at them under a microscope, measures heat, etc... Dewalt always comes out on top.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used the 3/32" bit to drill out some small machine screws. After three screws the tip of the bit was dull and deformed. The machine screws were stainless steel, this bit should not have died so quickly. You could probably save the bit by re-sharpening it but why bother wasting the time if they're made from a junk alloy that will quickly dull?
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DEWALT DW1361 Titanium Pilot Point Drill Bit Set of 21-Pieces is awesome. So far I have not used any of the drill bit yet so I can not rate durability, but it is "DEWALT", so nothing to fear. The 21 pieces come in the yellow box that characterize the brand which is printed right in the middle of the box. The box fits in the palm of a hand and the quality material is perfect. You get what you paid for!!!! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yunio

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I needed some bits smaller that didn't break after one use. These are pretty strong and though I have not tried to break one it is nice to have a few duplicate smallest bits so i don't have to stop the world and get to the hardware store. Comes in a nice case and hope they hold up to my needs. I have several DeWalt products and they are still working years later.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C

customer_reviews.title: and I am very happy with the quality of them
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale through Amazon during a special deal of the day type thing for $12.99. At this price, these are a steal, and I am very happy with the quality of them. I wish I had bought another set or two at that price. At the typical $30-ish price they still represent a good value.I feel that DeWalt has been gradually improving the quality and performance of their tools, as well as the variety. I've done some drilling in laminates with these and so far I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Cassell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Pure junk dropped drill bit on floor and it cracked in half
customer_reviews.author: tammy shearer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a first set of drill bits or the new homeowner.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a new homeowner. Perfect for installing drywall anchors, creating pilot holes, drilling through fire stops to run ethernet cabling. The smaller bits definitely won’t last as long as the larger bits, but that’s expected. Going low and slow will help preserve them.
customer_reviews.author: Shane M.

customer_reviews.title: SPEND YOUR MONEY ON ANOTHER BIT
customer_reviews.text: You would think DeWalt who makes some of the best tools on earth would back up all their drills with a quality drill bit.[JUNK] I cannot believe these bits are this poor. !!! Even with cutting oil cutting edge in the worst bit I ever owned.! Buy a set of Kendalk products or another brand you can atleast returned to a Dewalt dealer. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Dino Hallmark Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great Bits, but wrong case
customer_reviews.text: I love DeWalt. These bits are great and stand the test of time. Only issue I had was the case. It is not as pictured. They kept sending the case with the clear lid. I wanted the yellow case to match my other sets. Tried three times, but kept getting sent the wrong case. Bits are still the same though and tough and sharp as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: I hate these Dewalt cases
customer_reviews.text: Bits are average. Case is terrible like all these Dewalt drill bit cases. Putting each bit back into its slot is so annoying. I've owned other brands and none of them have such terrible cases. Dewalt brand is overrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo by morning

customer_reviews.title: good bits, didn't like the case
customer_reviews.text: The bits seem to be of good quality and quite sharp. They work quite well for my uses. I mainly use them for softer wood and thin sheet metal, so I can't speak to their long-term longevity or usefulness on harder materials as of yet. The case they come in, however, seems to be made from very cheaply molded plastic, and mine is such a rough fit that I can barely get the latch open/closed. Maybe I just got a dud, but even if it did work, the case would be nothing to write home about. Fortunately, I have a good, old-fashioned metal drill bit index to keep my bits in instead.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: I drilled 3 holes....
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't drilled the forth one. Gone! I have drilled more holes with the regular Dewalt metal bits than with this one. 0 Stars
customer_reviews.author: ViLo

customer_reviews.title: The Best?
customer_reviews.text: Not to keep you in suspense - no, but darn close to it! For the price of these bits you'll never go wrong and they can be star players for yourself or any DIY warrior. Commercially I'd have to say they rate a top 3 - but at the cost charged they ARE #1
customer_reviews.author: MaxGyver

customer_reviews.title: bad steel
customer_reviews.text: I wore out three drill bits after just a few holes in relatively soft metal. The steel is probably cheap China steel or something because they are certainly not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: mohica

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comprehensive set of bits for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great set of bits. The case is designed to nest with other cases, which is kind of neat, but means it won't quite sit flat. That's my only gripe. But still, for the price I've never seen such an extensive collection of drill bits. So far, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: Durable bits, awesome box.
customer_reviews.text: The bits are good and durable. The box design is just awesome, you can connect multiple boxes together and the latch is much better than the sliding ones that never stay latched. The bits are also much easier to get in and out than the older boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I got a clear cover case instead of all yellow plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item thinking it was the all yellow case. But nope they sent me a clear cover case one. Which i do not like the see scratch and cracks down the road. Hence thats why ibordered for the all yellow case. Also this clear case have a hole in it. I dont know if it a defect or its meant to be there for venting and keeping the bits from rusting. But i dont like it. I would prefer all sealed case. Water will eventually go in. Havent tried drill bit yet. But im pretty sure they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Zenas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of drill bits. I don't use them every day, but they seem to retain their sharpness as long as you use them for what they are intended. It comes with multiple bits in the smaller sizes, which are prone to breakage even in normal use no matter who made them, so you don't get stuck in the middle of a job having to run out and get a replacement. And the selection of sizes up to 1/2 inch should be more than adequate for most projects. I'm very pleased with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Gta04

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drill Set!
customer_reviews.text: Like the bits, their quality and strength, and the case to store/carry them. Finally replacing my old drill bits which are a good bit dull (had them since 1970's! Really like how well these drill, even at lower speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger C. Niemeier

customer_reviews.title: ... drill bits in the past and have always has good luck with them
customer_reviews.text: I've used these pilot point drill bits in the past and have always has good luck with them. This set worked just as well as any I've used before. I had to drill 72 holes through 3/8" channel steel to replace the deck on my trailer and the drill bit cut just as well on the last hole as it did on the first. In fact, the tip of the bit still looked new when I was finished as well. I used lubricating oil for every hole and that's the key to keeping a bit sharp. I'm definitely happy with the purchase and would recommend these bits to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice To Have Some Sharp Ones
customer_reviews.text: Some of the smaller sizes are duplicated, which I like. Those are the ones that get the most use and break the most. Very nice to have such a good range of sizes. Some people said the box is flimsy. Mine wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Just about the best drill bits I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Just about the best drill bits I've ever had. Considering the quantity and price, THE BEST I've ever had! No more guide hole punching while laying upside down under a car or whatever..... find where you want to drill, place bit...BAM! now there's a hole. Drills just about anything like butter. Wont last forever, but will last a long time for what it is. Case is nice too
customer_reviews.author: Dubso

customer_reviews.title: Bits will drill through anything
customer_reviews.text: I have used these bits to drill through wood, aluminum, steel, concrete and there were no issues. The pilot point allows for you to place the bit right where you want to drill and you will get a clean accurate hole every time. The bit pack does come with two of the smaller bits, which is nice since I have in the past snapped smaller drill bits when fabricating with metal. These bits do not flex, and are made of string material and seem like great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, would purchase again, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Since I made this purchase, I have used these every week and they're fantastic. The case keeps them secure and the latch on the cleverly designed case keeps them coming loose inside my tool bag. I have had other drills and other cases with fewer bits but this is by far my favorite. I have the screwdriver set as well and love those, too. I had never used a Dewalt before, but I am very pleased with everything I bought to go with the drill. Ladies, I am petite with smallish hands and my Dewalt has worked out great for my DIY projects. Get one for yourself! It's not too big or too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits that could drill through 1/8 " steel without breaking or becoming damaged
customer_reviews.text: Several of the smaller dirin bits the so called pilot point dissolved leaving the bit unusable. I am not sure if I believe the bits are actually titanium. The size range of the bits was excellent allowing me to step up to a slightly larger size if the initial bit failed.
customer_reviews.author: F. Savaglio

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the set!!
customer_reviews.text: Just started a chicken coop project for winter and realized my current set would not go through a metal frame. Titanium drill bits are quite pricey. This set was a really good price and does exactly what I need it to do (drill through metal without breaking). Definitely will be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: B J M

customer_reviews.title: I can buy the same kit from Menards for half the price. Not impressed. The tips are neat though.
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel this was worth the $30 shipped for it. Menards sells the same kit under their house brand for fifteen bucks. Remember - these are only titanium coated and not some sort of indestructable material like carbide. I'm not impressed - I think you are better off buying a jobber style drill bit assortment (like 10 per size) and using them a few times and tossing them. Not worth my time to resharpen. Edit: I want to make it clear that there is an American company that makes "cobalt" drill bits with a LIFETIME warranty. You will have to search the internet for it but they are priced competitively and sell much more durable bits.
customer_reviews.author: Don Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Very nice drill bits. Durable, and if you break one, or it gets too dull, you can order singles to replace them; I keep one of each single on hand so that it doesn't slow me down if I break or dull one.
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: They go through the toughest wood like a hot knife through butter. Never bogged down a drill or burned the wood.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good drill bits. They have a small brad/pilot point that lets you slowly get a starter guide dimple, then you can turn up the rpms and drill right though even the toughest boards. I use these for drilling starter holes when I'm assembling cabinets and furniture, and they work as well in a hand drill as they do in a drill press. They have walked right through oak, maple, walnut, and ash without any drag or burning. I highly recommend this set for anyone who needs to drill through any kind of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jack HTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose bits
customer_reviews.text: I got this set years ago and carry it around as a daily user on non heavy duty drilling, with occasional lightweight steel. I use nitro bits( $$$ but worth it) for heavy steel and machine shop use. After losing a few and breaking a few I decided to replenish and it was cheaper to buy the whole set than the individual bits. I love these bits for wood, plastic, drywall, and lightweight steel. great general purpose for my portable box.
customer_reviews.author: honeydidn't

customer_reviews.title: My go to bits!
customer_reviews.text: Great bits! These are always my go to drill bits. They are sharp and as long as you dont overheat them. They last a long time. Its also easy to find replacement bits should you break one. And Amazon has the best price I've seen on these by far!
customer_reviews.author: Frank k.

customer_reviews.title: These bits are easy to start and drill nice clean holes.
customer_reviews.text: These drillbits work great in metal and wood. I have been purchasing these for a few years and have been very happy with the quality. They do not last forever but they are a good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: if you've used bits before you know they're fine at first but you will ALWAYS break the smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: they're drill bits...if you've used bits before you know they're fine at first but you will ALWAYS break the smaller bits quickly...the bits themselves are great...just watch out for precision drilling (counter sinking)... these things grab quick and chew through wood very quickly....long story short i'd buy them again for the price/quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nanners1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value to multi-purpose bits of pretty much any size I could need.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value on a name brand that I know I'll be able to trust to cut through anything from wood to metal like butter. I've used plenty of Dewalt bits in the past. Nice to have any possible size I could need in one compact carrying case. I'm sure this is going to get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good drills
customer_reviews.text: As with all DeWalt products there is nothing not to like. There is no wobble and the hole is the dia. it should be. I make wooden gear clocks as a hobby. If the hole in the center of the gear is not just right, you get grief! With Dewalt this does not happen. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good value, wish the case was better
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the bits, I wish they were packed tighter - a smaller form factor, also deducted one star for the box latch being too hard to move, to tight and sticky takes hard pressure to close completely so I just engage it less than 1/4 inch
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Darn handy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and accurate, this bit set will cut clean holes in many materials and does so with haste. The 1/2" bit is the exception, leaving slightly ragged holes in soft wood. Then again, larger holes are best cut with either a hole saw or Forstner bits. I have used several of these bits, with a little oil, to pop holes through 1/4" galvanized steel. Recommended to anyone needing a basic bit set.
customer_reviews.author: Mike.B

customer_reviews.title: Broke/Bent the first time used
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this drill bit set due to it being attached with the DeWalt name brand. Worst mistake ever! The bit set was bought to install a aluminum toolbox on a utility trailer tongue. After drilling the first 2 holes, one bit bend beyond use so I decided to use another bit, which as seen in the pic, broke. I was using a Kobalt handheld battery drill on the lowest setting. Save your time, money and frustrations and buy a quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Works well, does what I need
customer_reviews.text: Sure, they aren't the best out there but for the price and ability have several around in shop, home, go-bags; these work well enough for what I need them for which is light drilling on foam tree carcasses. I've had a few go duller quicker than others or other brands in the same time but again; the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: I think you'll like these as much as I do.
customer_reviews.text: I tried drilling holes in a steel post using other drill bits I had and some broke and others started smoking. Then I ordered these. Unbelievable! These went through like nobody's buisiness. These bits are amazing. The carrying case is great too. I will order again after these wear out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Manoff

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought something else as the reviews are true
customer_reviews.text: They don't last. I used two bits as I am putting up some walls so only drilling in wood. One is now pretty dull and the other well on its way. Plus they are very short in my opinion. So, really, not a great product. When they work, they work great, cutting through wood like butter. Hence two stars instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Lacasse

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set several yrs ago for myself first, and they have done what I'd expect from them. Bought my daughter a set and she has had them two yrs now and loves them! Great set of quality bits. Easy to store in case and have found them reliable long term too. Its really a great deal. I can't say what "Daily" use would be like, but for projects through out the yr here and there, they work fine!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Goes through metal like butter.
customer_reviews.text: Went through the metal cabinet like butter. Drill never got stuck. Worked way better than my other bits that said they could go through metal. Made my project super easy! You also don't need a DeWalt drill to use these.
customer_reviews.author: horseyfun

customer_reviews.title: The Best Drill Bit Set EVER
customer_reviews.text: Over the last two years I have purchased three 'economy' drill sets at around $9 each. This time I decided to upgrade. My Dewalt drill is the best I have ever used. I had high expectations for the Dewalt drill bit set. I was not disappointed. The case alone is worth $10 and contains twice as many drills as the 'economy' package. I don't drill a lot of holes but these drill bits look like they might last a few months. The small pilot bit tip helps in keeping the drill from walking and the drill motor end of the shaft has flats to keep the bit from turning in the chuck.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: High quality drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I love these titanium drill bits. They helped me drill holes through stone/concrete in my fireplace to wallmount a television. The drill bits are high quality and durable. The Dewalt box they come in is very cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Utilitarian Set
customer_reviews.text: I needed a drill bit for a car audio install I am doing, but decided to buy this set so I am prepared for a wide range os uses in the future. Happy with the assortment of bits, like the rugged carrying case. It's DeWalt, so I have confidence in the durability even before my 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Dulls VERY fast in metal, but otherwise ok
customer_reviews.text: The bits work as expected from a less expensive set. They dull very fast in metal but work great in just about anything else. I have been using them on occasion for about 2 years. None have broken yet although the 1/2" bit I have used the most in metal, and it is basically a paper weight now. Great set for home use, will drill in just about anything you can think of. If your're looking for a good set for metal, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: James JamesonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: a real hole shot!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best drill bits I've owned. The pilot point is a real plus in starting the hole and the bits are super sharp. Hopefully the titanium will hold is edge and they'll last for a long time! Not sure how they could could be sharpened if not!
customer_reviews.author: R. Harshfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice Drill Set
customer_reviews.text: So far these have worked out great and performed as needed for projects around the house. I am glad I bought them. Don't buy cheap tools, you only pay more in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burton

customer_reviews.title: centering/flat cutting drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Imperial is cool, but the drill cutting angle/shape changes once you get below 1/4 inch? Great for drilling a flat surface in a countersunk bolt hole for cap screws. So far cutting edge is still doing it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fine drill bits at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These bits work very well. They are finished nicely and come in a sturdy case. Considering that they cost only around one dollar per bit, I think they are very well priced. I hope they last a long time -- especially the thinnest ones. I've bought two other titanium drill bit sets in the past and the thinnest ones have always snapped.
customer_reviews.author: JSG

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Hex
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set mainly because of the Hex shaft feature. However, hex shafts are only found on 3/16" bits and larger. There are other extra nice features, however: 1. Each bit is mounted in the case by tilting and inserting the shaft into a hole, then clicking it down into place, very secure fixation. 2. There are two each of the more easily damaged bits: 1/16", 1/8", 5/64" and 3/32". Overall a very nice, high quality set, but I wish even the smaller bits had hex heads, as the one I seem to have the most trouble with in the past is the 1/8".
customer_reviews.author: California Doug

customer_reviews.title: Complete pieces of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the 1/4" bit literally untwisted as soon as it grabbed the metal and now wobbles . Bought 4 sets i will see if i just got a bad bit or if others are as soft Updated ! These bits are garbage they are one hole wonder dont buy them.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Welder mom

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: At the very least this is a good way to replace broken and missing drill bits, and I even get a decent storage box. As for sturdiness, and durability, time will tell, so far i am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: But they still make some great tools, and these bits are one of them
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge dewalt fan, I think they've really gone down hill in the last 15 years. But they still make some great tools, and these bits are one of them. We use them on the jobsite, residential home building, and consistently find them to exceed expectations. I buy a box of these for every cordless drill set and shop drill. Where they really rock is drilling metal, had consistently great experience with these, as good or better as my Bosch tap drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Charles in Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Did not break and bites into metal great.
customer_reviews.text: Used to drill through wood metal and plastic with ease and didn’t break the bit after 15 holes into and around the interior of an RV.
customer_reviews.author: William Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Lock them up
customer_reviews.text: These look very dangerous. We kept them in the package and put them in the gun safe until we need them - hopefully that won't happen!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great bits for home use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice drill bits. These have been able to drill through everything I've thrown at that them and have stayed sharp for quite a while. I drilled wood, plastic, mild steel, sheet metal. The pilot points work better than other drill bits I've tried. I do still get a little walking on some metal drilling. This can be kept at a minimum by holding the drill firmly against the material. Also note, there are some duplicate bits of the smaller sizes. The description doesn't say this, but if you look at the zoomed in picture, you can see it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed performance
customer_reviews.text: Head of the bit broke of when drilled a metal plate. I pulled out an old generic drill bit and it completed the task with no issue. NOT RECOMMENDED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NLD09

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These seem like high quality bits. They're sharp as heck right out of the box. The only reason for 4 stars is the case has a built-in pinch point. Every time you open it your finger gets pinched on the backside of the case (unless you remember to unnaturally keep it out of the way).
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to own!
customer_reviews.text: Great drill bits. Durable. Able to complete around the home tasks with ease. The bits come in a strong sturdy case as well, great for keeping them organized, and will last for many years to come. Great accompaniment for any homeowner who owns a drill. *my only complaint is less than a week after purchase I saw this same item for a few dollars less at my big-orange-box-store. If you go there frequently, you may save a few dollars purchasing from there instead.. this in no way impacts my review of the item, because the drill bits themselves are great!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: The essential drill bit set
customer_reviews.text: If you've been using cheap drill bits, buy these. I never realized how critical the right bit can be, and these guys are super helpful. I've drilled in wood, plaster, and occasionally metal. But the real benefit is that they're steady and true. Dumped all my old bits I've accumulated over the years. And wouldn't think of using anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul G. Sabnis

customer_reviews.title: Good bits
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be holding up well and are better than some of my other "standard" bits in my tool box. And I've always been happy with Dewalt quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great low price for a good assortment of quality bits in a cheaply-made but compact case
customer_reviews.text: I used the 5/16 bit to drill 2 holes and it seemed to work great. I'm not a drilling expert, but I did stay in a Holiday Inn Express last night. It is nice to finally replace the cheap, dull bits I've been using for the last 10 years! Only negative I can report about this DeWalt kit is that the plastic case is a bit fragile--one of the 2 locking tabs broke immediately, but it still locks closed. I like the efficiency of the storage case--not a lot of wasted space and packs small.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt is the highest quality and most versitile tooling system
customer_reviews.text: Love these accessory sets for job specific needs. Dewalt delivers a quality product and I have a few more of these sets to round our my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Adam James Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My life is so much better since getting my drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: King Azzam

customer_reviews.title: Top quality drills with a reasonable price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these drills are not cheap, but as they are of excellent quality, they are worth every cent. All drills up to max. diameter went easily through a 2 mm stainless steel plate, without showing much wear. I tried to extend one hole to 16 mm with a HSS+ drill from Bosch that I purchesed separately (cost 10 $), but simply ruined it before I went through a single time! The plastic box of the DeWalt drills is a nice extra, as it not only stores the drills, but also holds securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: H. Schellhorn

customer_reviews.title: Not just good - but great bits!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe the difference between my old (new) set of drill bits and these. Super fast drilling. I like they have extras of the small ones (that notoriously break). I actually bought it for the case and to have spare set, now they are my go to's. Now DEWALT - if you are listening, how about these 2x stainless titanium coated in a hex shank drill bits set. Then, I would be in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: RedCardinal

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I used a bit the first time the other day. What a difference these bits make. I feel as though I don't have to force on them that hard, as they seem to pull themselves in. Someone was really using their head when they made the shank slip proof as well. The case is great. I've had a deWalt case before, but the one before felt cheap in the way it held the bits. This one feels solid and the bits go in easy, even the ones behind the other bits on the left. I highly recommend this if you had a cheap bit set before that kept breaking with light force.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rael

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My old bits were breaking like crazy....tougher project and these worked perfect even on an old 12v drill. Would buy these again but doubt I'll have to!
customer_reviews.author: LegitReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality home shop drill bits
customer_reviews.text: In a previous life I was constantly having to drill out stainless steel bolts and other metals. Long since those boat mechanic days, so I don't have a set of Snap-On cobalt drill bits any longer. These days I have the occasional project at home and these drill bits are of a solid quality and a reasonable price to keep at home. Expect many years of use
customer_reviews.author: Vatzhizname

customer_reviews.title: Great bits
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years. The work extremely well when using battery operated drills. Quick and clean holes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gerhold

customer_reviews.title: Drilling holes through my dead hard drives dulls the bits.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to expect. Drilling holes in my old or dead hard drives (to make them unreadable by anyone else) dulls the bits. Maybe the disks are a material that is too hard for the bits.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy Don’t easily crack!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it and now finally he can put up all the projects he’s been pushing off he said they are very durable as he had other ones that cracked easily so great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel g

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Tried it first time today and did the job drilling 20 holes in sheet metal and still works fine !
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Titanium dill bits are the best. Used them for wood, much more a solid drill. I don't even now if you can use these bits for drilling metal, but sensed it is the best drill bits I have for wood so far.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had these over a year. They've been lightly used for small household projects. No major building or intensive use. So far they've held up well. No problems and no breaking. Very happy to have this set.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Bit set
customer_reviews.text: Love the bits, love the case & love how the cases lock together. Makes my life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: J. French Rennier

customer_reviews.title: Hardness and Durability makes for long service life.
customer_reviews.text: After wasting money for cheaper bits at a big-name discount tool store, I went back to DeWalt. The hardness, durability and pilot point make these bits worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

product_meta.title: DEWALT Titanium Drill Bit Set, Pilot Point, 21-Piece (DW1361)
product_meta.description: DEWALT's titanium drill bits have a titanium coating that provides longer life when drilling in non-ferrous metals. These bits are also suitable for drilling in wood and plastic and are ideal for commercial and residential applications. Includes sizes from 1/6 inch to 1/2 inch in a plastic tough case.
feature_bullets: Titanium pilot point for longer bit life
Starts on contact for cleaner holes
No spin shanks. Clip latch for secure closing
Tapered web provides greater durability to reduce breaking
Includes sizes from 1/16 inch to 1/2 inch in a plastic tough case

specifications.Color: Yellow Titanium Pilot Point Drill Bit Set
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,698 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
